title: Tech News: All News and No Fooling
itunes:title: Tech News: All News and No Fooling
description:
Tech journalists hate April Fools. Twitter is banning some accounts claiming to be Amazon employees. Is Google collecting 20 times more data about you than Apple? And much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
